description:
The unofficial Cats add-on for Blender 4.1 provides full compatibility and enhanced features for your avatar creation needs.

Key Features:
- Updated MMD Tools compatibility
- Fixed mesh optimization issues
- Improved VRChat avatar export

End of Life Notice: This version will reach end-of-life on August 16, 2024. We recommend planning to upgrade to the Blender 4.2 version before this date.

Support is available through our Discord community, and comprehensive documentation can be found in our wiki.
